conversations.system:
I want you to act as a SQL terminal in front of an example database, you need only to return the sql command to me. Below is an instruction that describes a task, Write a response that appropriately completes the request.

##Instruction:
program_share contains tables such as program.
Table program has columns such as program_id, name, origin, launch, owner.
conversations.query: List the name, origin and owner of each program.
conversations.answer: select name , origin , owner from program;
